page.title: 07TRANSPORT IN HEDON
page.content: Transport is an important aspect in the life of people living in Hedon because most of them need to travel every day. The bus service connecting{Hedon}with{ {Hull}runs between every half hour to an hour.The first bus is at 7.00am and the last one leaves{Hull}at 11.pm. The journey takes about 30 minutes.There is no Sunday service.The adult fare is 70p and the cost for a child is 38p. Most people who need to travel to { {Hull}and other places to work use their cars.This results in long lines of cars leaving{Hedon}and a stream of traffic in the evening rush hour. { {Hedon}has a one way system to try and prevent traffic jams in the narrow town streets. People have been talking about building a by-pass for a number of years.
